questions.question: What is the empirical formula of Mn-MOF-1?
What is the coordination geometry around Mn1 in Mn-MOF-1?
What role do the tetra- and pentacoordinated Mn2+ ions play in Mn-MOF-1a?
questions.answer: They act as Lewis acid sites

questions.question: Is Mn-MOF-1 stable in a wide range of pH values?
What is the role of the uncoordinated N atoms in the ligands of Mn-MOF-1a?
questions.answer: They act as Lewis base sites

questions.question: Can Mn-MOF-1a be reused without a significant decrease in activity for at least 5 reaction cycles?
What is the crystal system of Mn-MOF-1?
What is the role of n-Bu4NBr in the cycloaddition of CO2 with epoxides catalyzed by Mn-MOF-1a?
Does the structure of Mn-MOF-1 remain unchanged after immersion in various organic solvents?
What is the BET surface area of Mn-MOF-1a?
What is the yield of the Knoevenagel condensation reaction of benzaldehyde and malononitrile using Mn-MOF-1a under optimal conditions?
Is the yield of the Knoevenagel condensation reaction affected by the presence of electron-withdrawing groups on the benzaldehyde substrate?
What is the yield of the cycloaddition reaction of CO2 with epibromohydrin under optimal conditions using Mn-MOF-1a?
Does Mn-MOF-1a show a relatively high CO2 uptake compared to some reported MOFs?
What is the space group of Mn-MOF-1?
What is the effect of electron-donating groups on the yield of the Knoevenagel condensation reaction?
questions.answer: They lead to a decrease in yield compared to electron-withdrawing groups

questions.question: Can the structure of Mn-MOF-1 withstand thermal treatment up to 300 °C without collapsing?
What is the yield of cyclic carbonates from the cycloaddition of CO2 with styrene oxide using Mn-MOF-1a?
Is the catalytic activity of Mn-MOF-1a for the Knoevenagel condensation reaction superior to most other reported transition metal MOFs?
What is the effective void volume of Mn-MOF-1 after removing the lattice water molecules?
